data.name: Mosaic Chronicles
data.detailed_description:
1.2 Update

- We are up to 13 mosaics in the second story


About the Game

Listen carefully, my friend. I shall tell you a story of courage, love, luck ... and the importance of reading skills! Mosaic Chronicles is a story-driven puzzle game inspired by the stories of Olga Gromyko. You’ll need to move and rotate the pieces of stained glass, placing them perfectly, to complete the mosaic and advance the story. Assemble two brilliant stories with over 50 mosaics to experience: A Bit of Horoscoping and The Lucky Knot! Follow the threads to save the beautiful princess – or a handsome mage – from the beast! KEY FEATURES: 1) Assemble beautiful stained glass mosaics. 2) Unveil the story piece by piece – inspired by the work of Olga Gromyko. 3) Visit the gallery to view completed mosaics and track your progress. 4) Choose from 3 difficulty levels.

Mosaic Chronicles is a story-driven puzzle game inspired by the stories of Olga Gromyko. You’ll need to move and rotate the pieces of stained glass, placing them perfectly, to complete the mosaic and advance the story. Assemble two brilliant stories with over 50 mosaics to experience: A Bit of Horoscoping and The Lucky Knot!

Follow the threads to save the beautiful princess – or a handsome mage – from the beast!

KEY FEATURES:
1) Assemble beautiful stained glass mosaics.
2) Unveil the story piece by piece – inspired by the work of Olga Gromyko.
3) Visit the gallery to view completed mosaics and track your progress.
4) Choose from 3 difficulty levels.
data.short_description: Listen carefully, my friend – and I shall tell you the story of courage, love, luck ... and the importance of reading skills! Move and rotate pieces of stained glass to complete mosaics and uncover the story in Mosaic Chronicles, a story-driven puzzle game.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“I'm engrossed.”
Eurogamer

“I need a million more games like Mosaic Chronicles, stat.”
Rock Paper Shotgun

“The art is truly beautiful and jumps off the story page.”
The Fandomentals

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10
  • Processor: 2007 or later
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11
  • Processor: 2007 or later
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
